programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: Two elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Eddie Peng charms as possibly the most handsome Monkey King alongside Shawn Yue & Ni Ni in this fantasy-action-adventure film.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: When a poor laborer picks up a toy for his son from a dumpster, the events that follow teach them about the true nature of family and things money can't buy.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Debt-ridden wedding planner, Sheng, finds a lifeline as he transitions into a funeral planner. Inspired by the respected Master Wen, Sheng gradually changes his attitude towards his career and life.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Headed by elite pilots, a special operations team is tasked to test new fighter jets. During test flights, the pilots face different difficulties and challenges, and try to push beyond their limits.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: Three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists on dinner together every night, but tensions rises when their girlfriends join the table.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: This action-packed drama as a grieving special force member whose investigation of the triads exposes the involvement of a corrupt cop.

programme.title: Go For Broke
programme.desc: With his family destroyed by drug dealers, Zhang Yao teams up with detective An to take down the drug lords. As the revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Love for All Seasons
programme.desc: Womanizer Tiger Hung arrives in Mount Emei to get the cure of his illness. May is the only woman who is capable to do so, but Tiger has to break her heart first before she gains the healing power.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is sealed away by the Dragon Master centuries ago and his daughter must travel back in time to kill the Dragon Master in order to reverse the act. But will she succeed?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: The highest grossing Chinese movie in Hong Kong history, the story tells of a barrister who swears to prove his client's innocence, going against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: A Hong Kong drama written & directed by Kearen Pang, former talent manager Mei Fung retired to take care of her husband & son, but decides to return to work to find her value in life.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth 2
programme.desc: Set as a prequel, when the sun was found to be dying, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home. To save the world, a group of young people decide to step forth.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk and Inspector Lau are stuck in their investigation for bribery and money laundering cases. Framed for bribery, Luk risks everything to gather evidence to clear his name.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Customs officers uncover illegal weapons on a cargo ship linked to an international conflict. Elite agents go undercover and reveal a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: After years of self-neglect, Le Ying decides to embrace life anew. Meeting a boxing coach sparks her desire for a fresh start. Despite the challenges ahead, she embarks on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: Hong Kong's survival is at risk due to a radiation leak. A fire brigade is assigned to stop cesium fallout by entering the radiation zone. Facing this unprecedented disaster, can they save the city?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: Bernard and Lung plan to get married when their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for all involved!

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Two best friends enter the Hong Kong Entertainment industry together in the 1980s but their fates differ. After a decade, their life choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: When the Stone Monkey is defeated by the God of War, he loses his power & falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill the promise he made to a desperate little girl and save the world?
